Kepala BKPM Sebut Jateng Provinsi Terfavorit Investasi
06 Nov 2019, 21:24 by Pemprov Jateng, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Kepala BKPM Bahlil Lahadalia menyematkan Jawa Tengah sebagai provinsi terfavorit untuk investasi karena terdepan dalam pelayanan perizinan. (Foto: Pemprov Jateng)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Jawa Tengah kini dijuluki sebagai provinsi terfavorit untuk investasi. Alasannya, Jateng menjadi yang terdepan dalam pelayanan perizinan dari seluruh provinsi di Indonesia. Kepala Badan Koordinasi Penanaman Modal (BKPM) Bahlil Lahadalia menyebut hal itu terbukti berdasarkan capaian Jateng sebagai peringkat pertama penyelenggara Pelayanan Terpadu Satu Pintu (PTSP) Terbaik se-Indonesia dalam acara Investment Award 2018."Jateng terbaik, lah. Tentunya ini bukti bahwa pemerintah sudah support. Perizinan mudah menjadi modal utama dalam mengundang investasi," ujar Bahlil dalam sambutannya pada Central Java Investment Business Forum (CJIBF) 2019 di Birawa Assembly Hall Hotel Bidakara Jakarta, Selasa (5/11). Bahlil juga meminta agar BKPM dan Pemerintah Provinsi Jateng terus berkolaborasi untuk meningkatkan investasi industri furnitur di Jawa Tengah. Hal ini sejalan dengan pesan Presiden Jokowi agar pemerintah proaktif menangkap peluang investasi relokasi pabrik furnitur dari perusahaan-perusahaan yang terkena dampak perang dagang AS-Tiongkok. "Kami (BKPM) sudah beberapa kali mempertemukan pengusaha-pengusaha furnitur di luar negeri dengan pelaku industri furnitur lokal. Harapannya, mereka segera dapat bermitra dan membuat pabriknya di Jawa Tengah," jelasnya. Sementara itu, Gubernur Jateng Ganjar Pranowo menyatakan Jawa Tengah mendulang bonus demografi lebih awal dibanding daerah lain. Untuk itu, wilayah yang dipimpinnya membutuhkan investasi sangat besar untuk mengakomodasi angkatan kerja yang berlebih. "Maka kami terus kejar investasi agar anak-anak kami bisa bekerja, karena ketika daerah lain baru akan mendapat bonus demografi, kita sudah dapat bonus itu," ujarnya. Bakal Gelar Wisata Investasi Pada CJIBF 2019, Jateng menawarkan dua sektor unggulan, yakni pariwisata dan manufaktur. Dua sektor ini didukung sektor lainnya yakni properti, infrastruktur, energi, dan agrikultur selaku penopang utama pertumbuhan ekonomi. Untuk menjaring investor lebih banyak, Jateng akan menindaklanjuti CJIBF dengan menggelar wisata investasi. Para calon investor yang berniat melakukan penjajakan lebih dalam akan diajak berkeliling ke berbagai daerah di Jawa Tengah. "Silakan datang ke Jateng kita ajak wisata investasi, tour guide-nya langsung Bu Ratna Kawuri (Kepala Dinas Penanaman Modal dan Pelayanan Terpadu Satu Pintu)," ujar Ganjar.

BKPM Head Mentioned Central Java Province Favorite Investment
06 Nov 2019, 21:24 by Central Java Provincial Government, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


BKPM Head Bahlil Lahadalia has pinned Central Java as the favorite province for investment because it is the leader in licensing services. (Photo: Central Java Provincial Government)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Central Java is now dubbed as the favorite province for investment. The reason is that Central Java is at the forefront of licensing services from all provinces in Indonesia. Head of the Investment Coordinating Board (BKPM) Bahlil Lahadalia said that was proven based on the achievements of Central Java as the first rank of the Best One-Stop Integrated Service (PTSP) in Indonesia in the 2018 Investment Award. " "Licensing is easy to become the main capital in inviting investment," Bahlil said in his remarks at the 2019 Central Java Investment Business Forum (CJIBF) at Birawa Assembly Hall Hotel Bidakara, Jakarta, Tuesday (11/5). Bahlil also requested that BKPM and the Central Java Provincial Government continue to collaborate to increase investment in the furniture industry in Central Java. This is in line with President Jokowi's message that the government proactively seize investment opportunities in relocating furniture factories from companies affected by the US-China trade war. "We (BKPM) have several times brought furniture entrepreneurs abroad with local furniture industry players. Hopefully, they will soon be able to partner and build factories in Central Java," he explained. Meanwhile, Central Java Governor Ganjar Pranowo said Central Java had been receiving demographic bonuses earlier than other regions. For this reason, the region he leads requires very large investments to accommodate the excess workforce. "So we continue to pursue investments so that our children can work, because when other regions will only get demographic bonuses, we will get the bonus," he said. Will Hold Investment Tourism at 2019 CJIBF, Central Java offers two leading sectors, namely tourism and manufacturing. These two sectors are supported by the other sectors namely property, infrastructure, energy, and agriculture as the main pillars of economic growth. To attract more investors, Central Java will follow up on CJIBF by holding an investment tour. Prospective investors who intend to explore deeper will be invited to tour various regions in Central Java. "Please come to Central Java, we will invite investment tours, the tour guide will be directly Mrs. Ratna Kawuri (Head of the Investment and Integrated Services Office at One Door)," said Ganjar.
